name: iMASSAGE Free & Pro Edition
description:
___________________________________________

Please note that iMASSAGE Free & Pro Editions are now deprecated and will no longer be supported or updated. The new iMASSAGE Gold Edition replaces these versions and has free lifetime updates. The Free & Pro Editions of iMASSAGE are still available as it may still suit some users needs.

iMASSAGE Gold Edition on Itch comes with a key for iMASSAGE on Steam too! ___________________________________________

iMASSAGE turns your gamepad into a handheld massager! Great for neck, back and muscle aches and pains. No need to go out and buy expensive massagers when you can turn your gamepad into one!

___________________________________________

Features:

 _

*Pro* 20 Vibration Patterns

20 vibration patterns in the Pro Edition! 

 _

*Pro* Dual Gamepad Support

Use up to two gamepads at once! Play alone or with a friend! (Free allows for one gamepad)

 _

*Pro* PS4 Lightbar Integration

Have your PS4 gamepads light up while in use!

 _

*Free*10 Vibration Patterns

10 vibration patterns in the Free Edition!

 _

3 Vibrating Modes

Rumble, vibrate or both allow you to customise the type of vibration you want!

_

9 Vibration Strengths

Increase and decrease vibration intensity as desired!

 _

One Handed Mode 

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

_

Easy Controls

Controls right on the gamepad!

 _

Onscreen Controls Guide

Always know what to press when you need it!

_

Dual Locking System

Lock the gamepads via button press and/or with an on screen lock! Ensuring you never press an unwanted button during use.!

 _

Hot Swap Controllers

No need to restart the app when a controller is disconnected or when switching between different controllers! 

_

Available NOW for Windows & MacOS!

_

___________________________________________

iMASSAGE Free Edition Includes 10 vibration patterns & single gamepad support for  free! $FREE$ iMASSAGE Free Edition Windows iMASSAGE Free Edition MacOS

___________________________________________

iMASSAGE Pro Edition Includes 20 vibration patterns, dual gamepad support & PS4 lightbar integration! $1.99USD$ iMASSAGE Pro Edition Windows iMASSAGE Pro Edition MacOS

___________________________________________

*The vibrating functions and strength of this app vary depending on the controller used.*

*Other controllers outside of Xbox One, Xbox 360 & PS4 controllers may work but not guaranteed or tested.*
*Xbox controllers do not work on the MacOS version, however PS4 controllers do.*

*Nintendo Switch Pro & JoyCon gamepads are not compatible with this app*

*Free & Pro Editions of iMASSAGE support wired USB connection only*

___________________________________________

Be sure to check out the other apps and games Takeover Studios has to offer!

Follow Takeover Studios on Itch.io to keep up to date with all the new apps and games coming soon!
